title: Declan Kearney – 2022 Statement on the Northern Ireland Assembly Elections
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Declan Kearney, the Sinn Féin National Chairperson, on 14 May 2022.
content:
The 5 May election has indeed proved to be the most important of a generation. It was a watershed.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
